learning.supervised.evaluation.cv

Class CVFoldsIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • learning.supervised.evaluation.cv.CVFoldsIO

  • public class CVFoldsIO
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the methods for persisting and loading the cross-validation folds.

    • Method Detail

      • saveAllFolds

        public static void saveAllFolds(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>[][] allFolds,
                int numTimes,
                int numFolds,
                java.io.File outFile)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Saves the cross-validation folds to a file.
        Parameters:
        allFolds - ArrayList[][] representing the folds.
        numTimes - Integer that is the number of repetitions of the fold procedure in this cross-validation.
        numFolds - Integer that is the number of splits (folds) in the cross-validation procedure.
        outFile - File to write the cross-validation folds to.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • loadAllFolds

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>[][] loadAllFolds(java.io.File inFile)
                                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads the cross-validation folds from a file. This can be used to run multiple rounds of tests on same data folds.
        Parameters:
        inFile - File to load the cross-validation folds from.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • saveAllFolds

        public static void saveAllFolds(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>[][] allFolds,
                int numTimes,
                int numFolds,
                java.io.Writer writer)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Saves the cross-validation folds to a file.
        Parameters:
        allFolds - ArrayList[][] representing the folds.
        numTimes - Integer that is the number of repetitions of the fold procedure in this cross-validation.
        numFolds - Integer that is the number of splits (folds) in the cross-validation procedure.
        outFile - File to write the cross-validation folds to.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
